verses.name: Genesis 39:15
verses.text: And it came to pass, when he heard that I lifted up my voice and cried, that he left his garment with me, and fled, and got him out.

verses.name: Genesis 39:16
verses.text: And she laid up his garment by her, until his lord came home.

verses.name: Genesis 39:17
verses.text: And she spake unto him according to these words, saying, The Hebrew servant, which thou hast brought unto us, came in unto me to mock me:

verses.name: Genesis 39:18
verses.text: And it came to pass, as I lifted up my voice and cried, that he left his garment with me, and fled out.
